EmailTemplate.name: 20JuneWeb-WinningBid.Invite 1
EmailTemplate.subject: June Webinar: Building a Winning Bid
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
So, you've found a potential client and they're interested in hiring you for the project. What will your next step be?
Please join us on June 20 at 1 p.m. ET, when we will hold a webinar titled "Building a Winning Bid: How to Respond to Requests for Proposals <http://info.mbopartners.com/20JuneWeb_WinningBid_RegistrationPage.html>." Tom Sant, co-founder of management and technology firm Hyde Park Partners, returns to our webinar series with a step-by-step process and valuable tips to help you create effective responses to a request for a proposal or quote (RFP/RFQ). From cover letters to the executive summary to the format itself, Tom will ensure you respond to your next RFP with a winning bid. Register today <http://info.mbopartners.com/20JuneWeb_WinningBid_RegistrationPage.html>! ___________________________________ MBO Partners
t: 703-793-6000 e: webinar@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/>
